## ObservabilityTools.ViewStateUserLogger class

ViewState-connected user logger that forwards messages to viewState.addMessage(). This logger bridges the observability system with React component state management.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ViewStateUserLogger extends Logging.LoggerBase implements IUserLogger 
```
**Extends:** Logging.LoggerBase

**Implements:** [IUserLogger](./ts-res-ui-components.observabilitytools.iuserlogger.md)
